TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExpandedResult

Docs.summary: Declares the members required to support enumerators for results and associated segments on an [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] `$expand` query option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Expand providers can generate enumerations that implement this interface to reshape expanded properties.

Docs.summary: Gets the element with expanded properties.
Docs.value: The object in a property expanded by .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetExpandedPropertyValue(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the property for which to get enumerable results.
Docs.summary: Gets the value for a named property of the result.
